data.text: @WVGovernor Shut the fuck up ,it does not.  Stop spreading lies ,ever wonder why wv is voting you out ? Its because youre a sell out and we need someone with balls not one that plays with his dogs on TV. Youre a coward ,a sheep and we don't support you .
@WVGovernor No, it doesn't. It provides little to no protection, and is potentially lethal.
@WVGovernor This lie needs to end. This shot is complete bullshit.
